DOC.brief_summary: The objective is to evaluate the effect of no-commercial enteral diet for patients in home nutritional therapy in anthropometric and biochemical indices comparing to patients using commercial enteral diets.
DOC.brief_title: No-commercial Enteral Diet for Patients in Home Nutritional Therapy: Effects on Anthropometric and Biochemical Indices
DOC.criteria: patients in home nutritional therapy receiving nocommercial enteral diets baseline diseases others than neurological
